column4: Hi Guys, need some serious help with my graphics card...anybody got some time?
ok running natty with an ATI technologies inc Rage 128 RK/VR graphics card, need to install the driver so I can get desktop effects and a clearer resolution
right now I am restriced to 1024 x 768 because my graphics card driver isn't installed properly, but you can see that the screen is out of focused and it fits awkwardly on the monitor
is 1024x768 ok for you if it was sharper?
Essentially I would like to use a larger resolution
that's what I'm asking. What res do you want?
it would be if it was sharper
I am not 100% certain what resolution I would like really it depends on how it fits on my screen once I see it
but 1024 x 768 would be ok if it were sharper
ok I pasted and saved that

ok, reboot to test. If it is bad then hold shift at boot, select roecovery mode then select root and run:  mv /etc/X11/xorg.conf /etc/X11/xorg.conf_old       note the X ni X11 is capitalized. You can then run: reboot and you will be back where you are now
ok if it is good what should I expect?
